column3: Recipient Email (Required for Int’l Sends Or Sync to Salesforce)
column13: Return Address Company name (Optional - By default, its your company name in Settings)
column14: Return Address Sender name (Optional - By default, its your name in Settings)
column15: Send delivery alerts to (Optional - To send them to yourself, do not map)
column16: Salesforce Contact/Lead ID (Optional - Used to sync data to Salesforce)
column17: Custom Note (Optional - used for custom messages)
